Event.Message: Windows Audio encountered an error while processing a device event. Event ID : 0x%1 (%2) Failure Code : 0x%3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Event" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="EventName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="hr" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Windows Audio encountered an error while processing a device event. DeviceEventType : 0x%1 (%2) Failure Code : 0x%3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceEventType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="DeviceEventTypeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="hr" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Windows Audio failed during a call to SetServiceStatus. Service Type : 0x%1 Current State : 0x%2 Controls Accepted : 0x%3 Win32 Exit Code : 0x%4 Service Specific Exit Code : 0x%5 Check Point : 0x%6 Wait Hint : 0x%7
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="dwServiceType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="dwCurrentState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="dwControlsAccepted" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="dwWin32ExitCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="dwServiceSpecificExitCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="dwCheckPoint" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="dwWaitHint" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Windows Audio failed to start the %1 subsystem. Subsystem Failure Code : 0x%2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="szSubsystemName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="dwSubsystemFailureCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows Audio Device Graph Isolation process (audiodg.exe) has terminated unexpectedly. Process Exit Code : 0x%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="dwAudioDgTerminationCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows Audio Device Graph Isolation process (audiodg.exe) could not be started. Error Code : 0x%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="dwAudioDgStartupFailureCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Capture Monitor has failed to restart the capture monitor between %2 and %3 %1 times. The capture monitor will no longer attempt to start this monitor.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="dwRestartCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="szInputEndpointName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="szOutputEndpointName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: StreamFlags %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="dwAudioSrvStreamFlags" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Start
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Object" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Stop
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Object" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Stop
Start
Stop

Event.Message: Format: %1 Sampling rate: %2Hz Offloaded: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Format" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SamplingRate" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="bAudioSrvStreamResourceType" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>
